name: 1951 5 panel cap
description:
Limited supply. Only 50 made in each style.

Our 5 panel caps have been created for the select few that appreciate a fitted style along with a carefully thought out design. Each cap's fabric has been carefully sourced by our designers to provide a unique quality to the individuals that wear them. When people compliment and ask about your style, well that means your doing something right. Our 5 panel caps, along  with our other garments are a sure way to get noticed for your ability to stay fashion forward. 
 

•Brim- black microsuede
•Adjustable snapback
•Available in two sizes (S/M & L/XL) 
 
S/M = 6 3/4 - 7 1/4 
L/XL= 7.1/4 -7 /4
*To figure out your cap size measure around your head with a flexible tape directly where the sweatband will rest. 
21' 1/4 - 22' 3/4 (54-58cm) = S/M
22' 3/4 - 24' 1/4 (58-62cm) = L/XL

name: Rhino 5 panel (earflipped)
description:
Limited supply. Only 50 made in each style. 

Our 5 panel caps have been created for the select few that appreciate a fitted style along with a carefully thought out design. Each cap's fabric has been carefully sourced by our designers to provide a unique quality to the individuals that wear them. When people compliment and ask about your style, well that means your doing something right. Our 5 panel caps, along  with our other garments are a sure way to get noticed for your ability to stay fashion forward. 
 
•Featuring a unique extra piece of material labeling this hat as "earflipped". Folds down for comfort during those cold winter outings, ties up on the top when you just wanna look cool. 
•Upper - Gray broadcloth material
